The easiest way to get paid for sharing your area of expertise

Back n Forth makes mutual support between you and your audience convenient and less intimidating. Empower your supporters to share their creations and learn through your feedback asynchronously.

How does it work?

Create an engagement

In just a few minutes you can create your first engagement. Just add a title, cover image, description, price, and decide if you want to limit the submissions you'll accept at one time.

Share it with your audience

After creating your first engagement, we provide quick share options for Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn. But you can also share this engagment on any platform by copying the provided link.

Respond to submissions

Once submissions are rolling in, you can craft responses from your computer or phone on-the-go. If words aren't enough - draw annotations right on the submission to illustrate your insights.

Key features

Flexibility

Choose when to type a response, draw a response, or do a mix of both

Limit the submissions you'll accept at one time to earn on your terms

Respond to submissions from anywhere, even from your phone on-the-go

Intimacy

Offer one-on-one support that is more convenient and less intimidating

Connect with your audience deeper and be apart of their individual growth

Better understand who your supporters are and what they're looking for

Support

Diversify your income and provide an experience worth paying for

Offer an affordable option of tailored education to your audience

We're here to support both you and your audience along the way

Frequently asked questions

Who should use Back n Forth and is it right choice for my audience?

Back n Forth is an ideal tool for anyone who wants to build deeper connections with their audience through visual knowledge sharing.

Do I need an existing audience to start using Back n Forth?

While this is not required, we recommend it. This could change in the future though as we find ways to help creators build their audience.

Do I need to be a resident of North America to sign up?

Yes we currently only support residents of North America. If you live somewhere else, follow us on social media to keep up with our future expansion plans.

How much will it cost for me to start using Back n Forth?

There are no monthly costs to use Back n Forth. We only charge a 20% fee per submission payment, which you can consider when pricing your engagements.

How do I accept payments and how often will I get paid?

We process all payments through Stripe, a globally trusted leader in payment security. You'll be paid weekly for all completed submissions.
